document.full_text: a urine sample that baseball home run king barry bonds submitted in 2003 was positive for banned performance enhancing drugs, the former director of a university of california lab said tuesday in bonds' perjury trial.
document.title: bonds' urine sample tested positive for steroids: lab chief
lines_and_colors: a urine sample that baseball home run king barry bonds submitted in 2003 was positive for banned performance enhancing drugs, the former director of a university of california lab said tuesday in bonds' perjury trial.
